alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:49PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and Freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to midnight AKST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel on Sunday. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop tonight. Snow will transition to freezing rain along the Glenn Highway from Chickaloon to Tahneta Pass and from Chistochina to Slana during the afternoon and evening. Precipitation will then transition back to snow Sunday night. The highest snow accumulations will be north and east of Glennallen.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
